name: Spring's Charm
outcome: {AttackerName} leans back and begins to cross and uncross {AttackerHisOrHer} enticing legs in midair, the natural light of the meadow giving them an irresistable sheen. {TargetName} flushes at the sight...
miss: {AttackerName} leans back and begins to cross and uncross {AttackerHisOrHer} enticing legs in midair. The display is arousing, but {AttackerHeOrShe} can't seem to get the right angle, failing to capture {TargetName}'s attention...
statusOutcome: {TargetName} can't seem to shake away the images of {AttackerName}'s legs in {TargetHisOrHer} head. {TargetName} is charmed!
